mapper.select: select * from public_code as a where a.id = #{id}
select * FROM public_code as a where a.REC_STS != 'I' or a.REC_STS IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into public_code ( public_code ,public_type ,public_name ,comment ,control_message ,start_time ,last_time ,UPT_TLR ,use_status ,REC_STS ) VALUES ( #{publicCode} -- public_code - IN char(15) ,#{publicType} -- public_type - IN char(2) ,#{publicName} -- public_name - IN nvarchar(50) ,#{comment} -- comment - IN text ,#{controlMessage} -- control_message - IN nvarchar(20) ,#{startTime} -- start_time - IN datetime ,#{lastTime} -- last_time - IN datetime ,#{uptTlr} -- UPT_TLR - IN char(6) ,#{useStatus} -- use_status - IN char(1) ,#{recSts} -- REC_STS - IN char(1) )
mapper.update: update public_code SET public_code = #{publicCode} -- char(15) ,public_type = #{publicType} -- char(2) ,public_name = #{publicName} -- nvarchar(50) ,comment = #{comment} -- text ,control_message = #{controlMessage} -- nvarchar(20) ,start_time = #{startTime} -- datetime ,last_time = #{lastTime} -- datetime ,UPT_TLR = #{uptTlr} -- char(6) ,use_status = #{useStatus} -- char(1) ,REC_STS = #{recSts} -- char(1) WHERE id = #{id} -- numeric(8, 0)
update public_code SET a.REC_STS = 'I' where id=#{id}
